tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE device_location_data (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceLocations (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    location_name TEXT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DeviceLocation (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE User (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE UserLocationAccess (
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    access_level ENUM('limited', 'full') NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE AccessLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    access_type ENUM('read', 'write') NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceLocations (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude NUMERIC,
    longitude NUMERIC,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    password VARCHAR(100),
    role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    user_id INT,
    last_ping TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UserAccess (
    user_id INT,
    device_id UUID,
    access_level INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, device_id)
)

CREATE TABLE AccessLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    device_id UUID,
    access_time TIMESTAMP
)
